help-file.title: NOVA
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <room> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Summoning
"Nova" coalesces a focal point of energy comprised of pure sunlight. The focal point grows, and grows, and grows, sucking all ambient light from around it. This nexus of light swells until it explodes, inflicting gruesome damage to anyone unlucky enough to be near it.
